content: slice of citrus coaster this pattern is based on a modified version of the pi circle as made popular by elizabeth zimmermann and as instructed by staci perry of verypink knits starting from the center and working your way out your citrus slice takes shape as you take advantage of the structure of the pi circle on the first increase row you begin the pulp on the next you add holes where seeds could have been on the last you start the pith and then add the segments finally you wrap your slice in its peel as you re binding off materials sizes 5 & 7 3 75 & 4 5 mm circular needles you will use magic loop or dpns pith color about 5 yds of dk/worsted weight yarn samples use white pulp color about 5 yds of dk/worsted weight yarn samples use light yellow and light orange peel color about 5 ft of fingering weight yarn samples use bright yellow and bright orange tapestry needle pins and a space for blocking abbreviations k knit kfb increase by knitting into the front & back yo increase by doing a yarnover … repeat what s inside the brackets to the end of the round st s stitches all images and text © little knibbles elissa brown 2022 pattern cast on leaving at least a few inches of tail on size 5 needles using magic loop on a circular needle or using dpns cast on 4 sts with your pith color and join in the round round 1 kfb all sts end with 8 sts adding the 1st segment line round 2 switch to your pulp color and kfb all sts end with 16 sts rounds 3-4 k all sts 2 rounds total round 5 kfb k yo the yarnovers create the seed holes end with 32 sts adding the 2nd segment line adding the 3rd segment line rounds 6-9 k all sts 4 rounds total bind off switch your working needle round 10 switch to your pith color and kfb all to a size 7 with your peel yarn bind sts end with 64 sts off using the standard bind off round 11 k 2 sts then start adding the finishing weave in/tie off ends on the wrong segment lines see photos upper side i like to use staci perry s method right with a 2-3 ft scrap of your pith for weaving in cotton ends you may color and a tapestry needle sew up consider waiting until after blocking from wrong side to right side to finish the ends from
